text: Ismael a Netanian otarim, egha a Elisaman igiavotarim, egha a Judan atrivimɨn ikɨzir mam. An atrivimɨn gumazir dapanir faragha zuir mamɨn ike. Babilonɨn atrivim Judan gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumazimɨn ikiasa Gedalia amɨsefe, ezɨ azenir kamɨn, an namba 7ɨn iakɨnim otozɨ, Ismael 10plan gumaziba inigha, Gedalian ganasa Mispan ize. Egha me Gedalia ko apiagha apir dughiamɨn, Ismael 10plan gumaziba ko me dɨkavigha, uan mɨdorozir sababa inigha Gedalia mɨsoghezɨ an areme.
